metadata.description: Spells that control, direct, and manipulate magic, vis, and mystical forces

spells.name: Dispel the Lingering Magic
spells.description: This spell dispels active magical effects by disrupting their magical structure. It can end ongoing spells, dismiss summoned creatures, or neutralize magical items temporarily. The spell works against effects of equal or lower level.

spells.name: Aegis of the Hearth
spells.description: This foundational spell creates a magical barrier around a covenant or dwelling that repels hostile magic and supernatural creatures. The Aegis provides protection against unwanted magical intrusion and is essential for any magical community.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (protect against magic), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Gather the Essence of the Beast
spells.description: This spell extracts raw vis from magical creatures or items, allowing the caster to harvest this precious magical substance. The amount extracted depends on the creature's power and the caster's skill in manipulating magical forces.

spells.name: Watching Ward
spells.description: This spell creates an invisible magical sensor that detects and alerts the caster to specific types of intrusion or magical activity within the warded area. The ward can be set to trigger on various conditions and sends mental alerts to the caster.

spells.name: Maintain the Demanding Spell
spells.description: This spell takes control of another ongoing magical effect, maintaining it without requiring the original caster's concentration. The spell essentially 'adopts' another magical effect, allowing the original caster to focus on other activities.

spells.name: Opening the Intangible Tunnel
spells.description: This spell creates a magical pathway that allows other spells to be cast through it as if the target were in the caster's presence. The tunnel bypasses normal range limitations and enables remote spellcasting across vast distances.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create magical conduit), +4 Arcane Connection, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Circular Ward Against Demons
spells.description: This spell creates a protective circle that demons and other infernal creatures cannot cross. The ward repels creatures with infernal Might and provides sanctuary against demonic attacks. The circle lasts until physically broken.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (ward against supernatural), +1 Touch, +2 Ring, +0 Circle

spells.name: Thaumic Resonance of the Mystic
spells.description: This spell attunes the target to magical energies, greatly enhancing their ability to sense, manipulate, and resist magic. They gain bonuses to magic resistance, spell penetration, and can detect magical auras more easily.

spells.name: Wizard's Communion
spells.description: This spell allows multiple magi to combine their magical power for a single casting, enabling the creation of effects far beyond what any single wizard could achieve. The spell coordinates the magical energies of all participants.

spells.name: Sever the Mystical Connection
spells.description: This spell severs magical connections between objects, creatures, or spells. It can break familiar bonds, disrupt arcane connections, or separate magically linked items. The severing is usually permanent unless the connection is reestablished.

spells.name: Mastery of the Rebel Spell
spells.description: This powerful spell allows the caster to take control of another magus's spell while they are casting it, redirecting the magical energy to serve the caster's will instead. The stolen spell can be reshaped and retargeted.

spells.name: Bind the Magical Essence
spells.description: This spell binds raw vis into a physical object, creating a permanent magical item that stores the mystical energy. The vis can later be extracted and used, or the item can serve as a focus for magical activities requiring that type of vis.
